text: Arau madiyanabasi sakalara ocarata sihamtara bhatr chu'a'ibaka praerana karaichilo. Te'om kaichila, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke kerala allahara ibadata karaa, te'omra bahirae tomalokara ana kono satya ilaha na'i; arau (suna) jokha-makhata kama nakaraiba; niscaya ma'i tomalokaka kalyanara majata dekhicho, kintu ma'i tomalokara bisaye eta sarbagraasi dinara sastira asanka karaicho’
